H0.text: Who was the last man to wim the Men's Singles Championship at Wimbledon prior to Roger Federer. Pete Sampras

H1.text: Who was the last man to wim the Men's Singles Championship at Wimbledon prior to Roger Federer. Andre Agassi

H2.text: Who was the last man to wim the Men's Singles Championship at Wimbledon prior to Roger Federer. Goran Ivanisevic

H3.text: Who was the last man to wim the Men's Singles Championship at Wimbledon prior to Roger Federer. Lleyton

A4.text: Hewitt was the last man outside the so-called 'Big Four' to win Wimbledon until Carlos Alcaraz in 2023.

A5.text: Hewitt was the first 'baseliner' to win the tournament since Agassi in 1992.
